backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage and authorization mixins plus types and CRUD logic for user profiles, places, routes, emergency profiles, and SOS snapshots.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend source files to aid build analysis.
Manual smoke‑test checklist for verifying flyer download, QR code quality, fallback handling, and error behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, and initialization logic for the entire React app.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin pages by checking user role and showing loading or access‑denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Guards routes by checking for an authenticated identity and shows a login prompt if missing.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, sidebar navigation for authenticated users, mobile menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Renders navigation buttons based on current route and user role, including admin and emergency lookup links.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Displays the app header with branding, share button, emergency lookup shortcut, and login button.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages generating, viewing, copying, and rotating the user's emergency access code and principal ID.
Form for creating or updating the user's emergency profile containing next of kin and health info.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a setup dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name to create a profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: UI card for uploading license and ID documents with validation, progress tracking, and verification status display.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Generates a flyer-style preview with branding, intro text, QR canvas, and fallback error display.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Dialog for generating, displaying, copying, sharing, and downloading a shareable QR code and link.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Public SOS emergency info card showing contacts, health details, and last known location with map link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, and handling login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: React hook that renders a QR code to a canvas with abort control, timeout safety, and ready/error state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, verification, places, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables styled around safety and asphalt color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑character access code using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Clipboard copy utility that uses the Clipboard API with a fallback to a DOM-based execCommand method.
frontend/src/lib/domToPng.ts: Empty placeholder file for DOM-to-PNG utilities.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file size and type and provides a helper to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Exports a flyer element to a high-resolution PNG by manually rendering content and a QR canvas onto an HTML canvas.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Fetches the user's current geolocation with detailed error handling and high‑accuracy options.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps place category enums to labels and provides utility functions and options for UI usage.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Empty placeholder file for QR-related utilities.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Low-level QR code generator implementing error correction, Galois field math, and module placement per QR spec.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Provides a function to validate a canvas and download it as a PNG via a blob and temporary link.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Implements Web Share API with clipboard fallback and returns structured status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app’s canonical share URL using window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts dates to bigint timestamps, back to Date, and formats them for display.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read and clear URL parameters supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page for authenticated users to add a place with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating routes, converting date input to bigint time and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Admin interface to look up users and approve or reject verification requests.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Page allowing lookup of emergency information using a principal ID and access code.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Generates a shareable flyer with QR code, supports auto-exporting and manual PNG download, and provides link copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that redirects authenticated users and showcases feature cards for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected place, including category, description, and submitter.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists safe places with search and category filters and allows authenticated users to add new places.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user's profile with verification, emergency info, and access code management components.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing minimal route detail with navigation back to the routes list.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Displays the user’s routes, allows searching routes by principal, and links to add new routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Displays the user's SOS card, fetching emergency profile data and showing loading, card view, or a prompt to set up a profile.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Provides UI to capture a one-time SOS location snapshot and navigate to view the SOS card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for build planning.
